name: Mavien
description:
You seek the MAVIEN, an elusive orb sought by many souls.

Walk through the surreal city of Amaranth, and uncover a journey of arrogance and failure. In due course, your unforeseen fate will be revealed.

Keyboard and mouse is the recommended way to play the game, but gamepad is also fully supported.

This game was developed using GameMaker: Studio 1.4 over 1 year and 8 months. The artwork was designed using a combination of paint.net and Aseprite. The music was composed in FL Studio 20.
